mods.abstract: Unknown The Colony dormitory exterior view from the northwest, with tennis nets in foreground. Originally used as the quarters of the treasurer and professor of mechanics (1887-1888); Handwritten on back- 'The Colony' Louisiana State University.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
